desc: Get logs for a specified app

token.desc: Authentication token bearing required scopes. Tokens should be passed as an HTTP Authorization header or alternatively, as a POST parameter.

app_id.desc: The id of the app to get activities from.

team_id.desc: The team who owns this log.

cursor.desc: Paginate through collections of data by setting the `cursor` parameter to a `next_cursor` attribute returned by a previous request's `response_metadata`. See [pagination](/apis/web-api/pagination) for more detail.

limit.desc: The maximum number of items to return.

min_log_level.desc: The minimum log level of the log events to be returned. Defaults to 'info'. Acceptable values (in order of relative importance from smallest to largest) are ('trace', 'debug', 'info', 'warn', 'error', 'fatal').

log_event_type.desc: The event type of log events to be returned.

source.desc: The source of log events to be returned. Acceptable values are ('slack', 'developer').

component_type.desc: The component type of log events to be returned. Acceptable values are ('events_api', 'workflows', 'functions', 'tables').

component_id.desc: The component id of log events to be returned. Will be 'FnXXXXXX' for functions, and 'WfXXXXXX' for workflows

trace_id.desc: The trace id of log events to be returned.

min_date_created.desc: The earliest timestamp of the log to retrieve (epoch microseconds).

max_date_created.desc: The latest timestamp of the log to retrieve (epoch microseconds).

sort_direction.desc: The direction you want the data sorted by (always by timestamp)

internal_error.desc: Something went wrong on our end, please try again.

invalid_app_id.desc: App ID provided is not valid.

invalid_app.desc: App ID provided is not valid for team and user.

invalid_args.desc: Required arguments either were not provided or contain invalid values.

invalid_cursor.desc: Value passed for `cursor` was not valid or is no longer valid.

free_team_not_allowed.desc: Feature is only available on a paid team.

restricted_plan_level.desc: Feature is not available on this team
